linefit.FitAlgorithms

Class QuadraticApproximationFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • linefit.FitAlgorithms.LinearFitFactory
      • linefit.FitAlgorithms.QuadraticApproximationFactory

  • class QuadraticApproximationFactory
extends LinearFitFactory
    The Quadratic Approximation Factory class that is used to create the Quadratic Approximation Strategy so that it can be done in a generic way during run time, allowing the user to change the algorithm This algorithm makes use of the quadratic equation to calculate the Chi Squared values for the data with given slopes and intercepts Chi Squared (S) is written as: S1 = S0 + alpha(b1 - b0)^2 + beta(m1 - m0)^2 + 2gamma(b1 - b0)(m1 - m0), where S1 is the Chi squared being calculated with the given m1 and b1 and S0 is the Chi Square of the calculated starting point and m0 and b0 are the calculated starting slope and intercept
    Since:
    0.98.1
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Don Petcher and Keith Rice

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  QuadraticApproximationFactory.QuadraticApproximationStrategy
      The private class for the Quadratic Approximation Algorithm that does the calculations and that is made by the Quadratic Approximation Fit Algorithm

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static QuadraticApproximationFactory instance
      The private instance of this factory so that we only have one object allowing us to populate the user selected algorithm box with the current factory

      • Fields inherited from class linefit.FitAlgorithms.LinearFitFactory

        canGeneratedFitsFixIntercept, canGeneratedFitsFixSlope, fitAlgorithmFactories

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private QuadraticApproximationFactory()
      The constructor that allows us to create the Quadratic Approximation Algorithm Fit Strategy without knowing which factory it is and also determines whether or not its child can fix its slope or intercept

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LinearFitStrategy createNewLinearFitStartegy(DataSet dataSet)
      Creates a new instance of the type of FitAlogritm this Factory is This allows us to generically create the fit algorithm and not have to specify before runtime what kind of linear fit we are using
      (package private) static QuadraticApproximationFactory getInstance()
      returns the instance of the factory and makes sure that only one object of it is ever created (singleton) so that we can check what fit is being used easily
      java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides the to String for the Fit Algorithm so that it displays this name for the User to select in the fit algorithm drop down box
